casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

August 4, 2010

[Cite as 08/04/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-3568.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0525. State v. Jones.

Summit C.P. No. CR-2007-04-1294. This cause is pending before the court as a death-penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Summit County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for new attorneys to be appointed for the direct appeal,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
